str2: A fornicator, man who prostitutes himself. From pernemi; a prostitute, i.e. a debauchee.
A male engaging in same-gender sexual activity; a sodomite, pederast. From arrhen and koite; a sodomite.
An enslaver, one who forcibly enslaves, a kidnapper. From a derivative of a compound of aner and pous; an enslaver.
A liar, deceiver. From pseudomai; a falsifier.
Perjured, sworn falsely. From epi and horkos; on oath, i.e. a forswearer.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
(a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To resist, oppose, withstand, lie opposite to. From anti and keimai; to lie opposite, i.e. Be adverse to.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: From hugies; to have sound health, i.e. Be well; figuratively, to be uncorrupt.
